hizbs.text: Dangtian zhan lie,
tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
dangdi zhankai,
bing pao qi suo huai, erqie bian wei kongxu,
tingcong zhuming, erqie yi yu tingcong de shihou;
ren a! Ni biding mianli gongzuo, zhidao huijian ni de zhu, ni jiang kan dao ziji de laoji.
Zhiyu yong youshou jieguo gongguo bu zhe,
jiang shou jianyi de jihe,
er xinggaocailie de fan yu ta de jiashu;
zhiyu cong beihou jieshou gongguo bu zhe,
jiang jiaokuliantian,
ru yu liehuo zhi zhong,
congqian ta zai jiashu jian yuan shi kuaile de,
ta yi caixiang ta jue bu hui gui yu zhu.
Buran, ta de zhu, yuan shi jian cha ta de.
Wo yi wanxia mengshi,
yi heiye ji qi baoluowanxiang de mengshi,
yi yuanman shi de yueliang mengshi,
nimen biding zaoyu chongchong de zainan.
Tamen zen neng bu xindao ne?
Dang bieren dui tamen xuandu “gulanjing” de shihou, tamen zenme bu koutou ne?※(Ci chu koutou!)
Buran, bu xindao de renmen, shi fouren zhenli de,
zhen zhu quan zhidao tamen xinzhong yincang de dongxi,
gu ni dang yi yi zhong tongku de xingfa xiang tamen baoxi,
wei xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang shou buduan de baochou.
Shi yi you gong fen de qiong cang,
He suo jinggao de rizi,
yiji neng zheng de he suo zheng de rizi,
yuan jue keng de renmen, bei qi jue,
na keng li you ranliao dianzhe de huo,
dangshi, tamen zuo zai keng bian,
tamen jianzheng ziji dui xinshimen de zuixing,
tamen dui yu xinshimen, zhi zebei tamen xinyang zhenzhu wanneng de, ke song de zhu,
tiandi de guo quan zhishi ta de, zhenzhu shi jianzheng wanwu de.
Tiandi de guo quan zhishi ta de, zhenzhu shi jianzheng wanwu de.
Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, bi ru xia lin zhu he de leyuan, na que shi weida de chenggong.
Ni de zhu de chengzhi, que shi yanli de.
Ta que neng chuangzao, qie neng zaizao,
ta shi zhi she de, shi zhi ai de,
shi baozuo de zhu, shi zunyan de,
shi weisuoyuwei de.
Ni ceng tingjian jundui de gushile ma?
Falao he sai mo de ren de gushi.
Buran, bu xindao de renmen xianyu fouren zhi zhong,
pohai xinshi hexin nu er bu huiguo de renmen, bi shou huo yu de xingfa, bing shou huozai de chengzhi.
Buran, zhe shi zunyan de “gulanjing”,
jilu zai yikuai shou baohu de tian pai shang.
Yi qiong cang he qi mingxing mengshi,
ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenmo?
Shi na canlan de mingxing.
Mei geren, dou youyige baohu zhe.
Ren yingdang xiang yi xiang, ta ziji shi yong shenmo zaocheng de?
Ta shi shechu de jingye zaocheng de.
Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de.
Zhenzhu que shi neng shi ta fuyuan de,
na shi zai yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri.
Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
Yi han yu de yun
he you feng di di fashi,
zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci,
zhe bushi xiaohua.
Tamen biding yao yong jimou,
wo ye yao yong jimou.
Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia.
